dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT a.order_base_xid, ROUND(obl.weight_base, 3) total_weight, TO_CHAR(obl.early_pickup_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') early_pickup_date, TO_CHAR(obl.late_delivery_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') late_delivery_date, obl.source_location_gid, obl.dest_location_gid, a.inco_term_gid, a.term_location_text, (SELECT LISTAGG(obr.remark_text, '; ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY obr.remark_text) FROM ob_remark obr WHERE obr.order_base_gid = a.order_base_gid AND obr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.ADDITIONAL NOTES') additional_notes FROM (SELECT oob.order_base_gid, oob.order_base_xid, oob.inco_term_gid, oob.term_location_text FROM ob_order_base oob WHERE oob.order_base_gid = :P_ORDER_BASE_GID) a INNER JOIN ob_line obl ON a.order_base_gid = obl.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON obl.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON obl.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid WHERE ROWNUM = 1
select trim(to_char(sysdate,'FMDay,Month DD, yyyy ')) CURR_DATE from dual
SELECT column_name, old_value, new_value FROM GLOGOWNER.xxscou_spot_contract_tbl WHERE modified = 'Y' AND order_base_gid = :P_ORDER_BASE_GID
SELECT r_version,r_version-1 o_version FROM glogowner.xxscou_spot_contract_tbl WHERE order_base_gid = :P_ORDER_BASE_GID AND rownum<2
